BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Exoduster
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: This was one of the early hard-baked markings. It’s been pulled into the decal system so it can be recolored and reused across kit.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Cracked Skull
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: This was one of the early hard-baked markings. It’s been pulled into the decal system so it can be recolored and reused across kit.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Suzerain
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A symbol of an ancient civilization often fondly remembered for its purity, its original ideal warped by political opportunists seeking control.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Iron Front
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: This symbol is used often by the various Deserter forces and anti-imperial demostrations, often painted onto improvised shields and signs.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Communard
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A symbol of a failed revolution that occured on a strange distant world, unorthodox among other leftist designs but still found during demostrations.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Jaegtuti
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A commonly seen symbol of the Vasilevsky Crimson Guard, a proletarian army dedicated to the preservation of their liberated home from all threats.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Sabbath
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A commonly seen symbol of the Vasilevsky Crimson Guard, a proletarian army dedicated to the preservation of their liberated home from all threats.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Palatine Regiments
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A commonly seen symbol of the Vasilevsky Crimson Guard, a proletarian army dedicated to the preservation of their liberated home from all threats.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Trench Dog Regiment
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A commonly seen symbol of the Vasilevsky Crimson Guard, a proletarian army dedicated to the preservation of their liberated home from all threats.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Crimson Guard People's Infantry
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: A commonly seen symbol of the Vasilevsky Crimson Guard, a proletarian army dedicated to the preservation of their liberated home from all threats.
